appinfo_list.name: Developer
appinfo_list.value: Department of Transport and Main Roads Queensland

app_descript:
Brief

"QLD Rego Check" is a dedicated mobile application developed to offer residents of Queensland, Australia, a quick and efficient means to verify the registration status of their vehicles. By simply entering the vehicle's registration number, users can access essential information such as registration validity dates and necessary renewal payments. This app aims to simplify the process of managing vehicle registration, ensuring that drivers remain legally compliant with local transportation laws.
